contentrichtext.text: {{for|the German author|Hans Jakob Christoffel von Grimmelshausen}} {{Infobox German location |image_photo = |Wappen = |lat_deg = 50 |lat_min = 29 |lat_sec = 0 |lon_deg = 10 |lon_min = 38 |lon_sec = 0 |Lageplan = Grimmelshausen in HBN.png |Bundesland = Thüringen |Landkreis = Hildburghausen |Verwaltungsgemeinschaft = Feldstein |Höhe = 360 |Fläche = 4.21 |Einwohner = 193 |Stand = 2006-12-31 |PLZ = 98660 |Vorwahl = 036873 |Kfz = HBN |Gemeindeschlüssel = 16 0 69 016 |Adresse-Verband = Mauerstr. 9<br />98660 Themar |Website = [http://www.vg-feldstein.de www.vg-feldstein.de] |Bürgermeister = Thomas Hanft }} '''Grimmelshausen''' is a municipality in the [[Hildburghausen (district)|district of Hildburghausen]], in [[Thuringia]], [[Germany]]. {{Cities and towns in Hildburghausen (district)}} ==References== {{Reflist}} [[Category:Municipalities in Thuringia]] {{Hildburghausen-geo-stub}}
